Hi, I'm Adam.

I am an Environmental Scientist and Data Analyst. Explore my website to learn about applying data techniques to environmental issues using R. You will find information on water quality modelling and scoring, environmental mapping, satellite monitoring, and spatial science.

This website, my CV, and all showcase projects were built in R.
